dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated from a context-free grammar (CFG) to evaluate the performance of the AriEL method. The dataset includes sentences with a large vocabulary and numerous grammar rules, designed to stress-test the learning methods.
dcterms:title: Toy Grammar Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. De Vries
F. Strub
S. Chandar
O. Pietquin
H. Larochelle
A. C. Courville
dcterms:description: A real dataset of human dialogues where participants ask questions to identify a visual object. The dataset is used to evaluate the performance of the AriEL method in generating diverse and grammatically correct sentences.
dcterms:title: GuessWhat?! Dataset
